title: How to pay a professional tax accountant - Quora

response.answer_text: Paying a professional tax accountant is done in the same way as with any other provider of professional services. It can be by check, bank transfer or even in the form of cash, although the last is not common. The best option is to have a qualified professional accounting firm working on an ongoing basis so that there is a clear understanding of the accounting practices to be followed and a defined system of payment.
